tool_description: Manages prescription renewals by evaluating patient needs, medication effectiveness, and safety considerations for ongoing therapy.

prescription_id.description: Unique prescription identifier for renewal consideration

error_messages: Prescription not found: The provided prescription_id is not valid or has expired.
Patient mismatch: The prescription does not belong to the specified patient.
Invalid renewal duration: Renewal duration must be between 30-365 days.
Prescription not eligible for renewal: The prescription cannot be renewed due to safety or regulatory restrictions.
Maximum refills exceeded: No more refills are authorized for this prescription.
usage: Provide prescription_id and patient_id to evaluate renewal eligibility. Optionally specify renewal_duration_days for custom renewal periods.

renewal_eligible.description: Whether the prescription can be renewed

remaining_refills.description: Number of refills remaining on current prescription

required_monitoring.description: Required tests or assessments before renewal

next_review_date.description: Recommended date for next medication review (ISO 8601 format)
